lyrics.stanza: When I've run the race before me And have fought to victory, I'll be raptured to the glory of the Lord; When I've kept the faith at any cost, The Holy City then I'll receive as my reward.

Though my feet are often wearied On the rough and rugged path, Just by thinking of that city, I'm restored; Though my eyes be filled with tears, My heart will evermore be fixed On that City, my reward.
